welcome.title: Welcome to AccBot Setup Wizard
welcome.description: AccBot is an open-source DCA bot that automatically buys cryptocurrency at regular intervals.

exchange.title: Select Your Exchange
exchange.description: Choose the cryptocurrency exchange where you have an account.

config.title: DCA Configuration
config.description: Configure your Dollar Cost Averaging strategy.

telegram.title: Telegram Notifications
telegram.description: Set up Telegram to receive notifications about your purchases.

deployment.title: Deployment Target
deployment.description: Choose where to run your AccBot instance.
